title: Meditations of instruction, of exhortation, of reprofe indeauouring the edification and reparation of the house of God.
author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.
publisher: Printed by I. L[egat] for George Gibbs and Francis Constable,
notes: Dedication signed: F.R., i.e. Francis Rous.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
